name: Aerospace Studies
descriptions: TCU's Aerospace Studies program is the Air Force ROTC (Detachment 845), designed to develop leadership skills for professional and personal growth within a military framework. The program emphasizes values of true leadership and service to the greater good.

TCU's Detachment 845 ranks highly nationally in GPA and physical fitness assessments and was recognized as the best small Detachment in the Nation, maintaining regional excellence for three consecutive years.

courses: Foundations of the United States Air Force

electiveCourses.description: Specific entry requirements apply. Students may pursue any major while completing AFROTC coursework.

features: Recognized as best small Detachment in the Nation
Can be combined with any major
Graduates commissioned as Second Lieutenants in the Air Force
